name: Firebox
description:
KNOWN BUG: When triggering first dialog with the Firebox, walking forward will cause the dialog to play again. walk BACKWARDS to avoid being locked into the dialog sequence again. Apologies. 

Firebox was made by Facet Starlight for the 2021 Narrative Driven Game Jam #3!

Follow our protagonist Mable as she unravels the mystery of the Firebox.

What was made for this jam?:

All models, textures, materials*, and game systems where made from scratch for this jam, as well as original Song "The Firebox" Composed by Leviticus.

Facet Starlight is a 2 person studio consisting of Joshua Hames (Leviticus) and Sara Hames(SoapyBits). We make games for fun in between our full-time jobs. When we're not making games, we're hanging out in the Facet Starlight Discord, a place for artists and anyone to hangout, make friends, and explore the facets of their craft.
